src:
Dauning strit ponovo odbio da objavi izveštaj o mešanju Rusije u britanske izbore

05 Nov 2019, 19:35

Vlada Velike Britanije danas je ponovo odbila da objavi izveštaj o mogućem mešanju Rusije u britanske izbore, navodeći da joj je potrebno još vremena za razmatranje tog dokumenta.Izveštaj odbora britanskog parlamenta za obaveštajna i bezbednosna pitanja poslat je premijeru Borisu Džonsonu 17. oktobra, a za njegovo objavljivanje potrebno je odobrenje vlade.Ako izveštaj ne bude objavljen do sutra, kada se parlament raspušta, on neće biti dostupan javnosti pre vanrednih parlamentarnih izbora 12. decembra.Poslanici više stranaka, uključujući Džonsonove konzervativce, pozvali su vladu da objavi izveštaj tokom debate u donjem domu parlamenta, ali je zvaničnik ministarstva spoljnih poslova Kristofer Pinčer uzvratio da "nije neuobičajeno" da revizija takvih izveštaja potraje.
text:
Downing Street again refused to publish a report on Russia's meddling in the British elections

05 Nov 2019, 18:35

The UK government has today again refused to publish a report on Russia's possible meddling in the British elections, saying it needs more time to consider the document.The report by the British Parliament's Committee on Intelligence and Security was sent to Prime Minister Boris Johnson on October 17, and for its publication requires government approval.If the report is not released by tomorrow, when parliament dissolves, it will not be available to the public before the snap parliamentary elections on December 12.Multiple parties, including Johnson's Conservatives, urged the government to publish the report during a debate in the House of Commons, but Foreign Ministry official Christopher Pinscher said it was "not uncommon" for such reports to be revised.
